content.description: There are feet, a nub for the left hand and a pretty good right hand hold, there is one hold up above that, I'm not going to lie and say I sent it so I can't give too much beta.
content.protection: The only tough spot on this you're pretty committed on and there's a large rock just behind you so I would want at least a spotter or a spotter and a pad.
content.location: After you pass Chossy there is a large sandy area, to jump up to the next area you would have to pass between Egg and another smaller boulder, Egg White is right there on the far right corner of Egg.

content.description: This is a boulder with very little to do on it, in all honesty while I was trying to mount the thing it kept making me laugh because I felt like I was climbing on an egg.  Marble Cake, Chossy Roadkill and Egg are all pretty close together with Egg being the furthest back in the canyon.  While you're playing around in the area it's worth a visit.
